P1: Irrational Investors is a free invite-only financial group where people with an experience in investing and trading collaborate to share stocks & crypto analysis🔍, investment tips🏦 and trading strategies📈. You don't need to be an expert to join - you just have to be interested in trading🤠.
L1: Tap below to join our waiting list
P2: We don't limit our conversational topics to just crypto and stocks🧐📈. We're open to every financial topic - You can join and share your ideas about e-commerce🛍️ drop-shipping📦 property/retail🏠 and anything else that involves money! We have and accept all ranges of people, from newbies to seasoned professionals already working in the industry👩‍🚀🤵.
